game.name: Smart Lab
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, LAN Co-op, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Smart Lab: 연구실을 처음부터 만들고 새 레시피를 연구해 생산 체인을 최적화하세요. 배치 생산으로 품질을 높이고 결과를 판매해 더 크게 확장하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Smart Lab: Build your lab from the ground up, research new recipes, optimize production chains, and craft valuable products. Produce in batches, improve quality, and sell your results to keep expanding.
